Entries.secondChance_Guys: Why are you playing with me like this?... *sigh*...
Entries.Mon4: Hey. I'm not sorry if I came off as rude when we first met.#$e#Just wanted you to know that.
Entries.Mon10: Do you ever feel like the whole world sees you as joke?
Entries.Tue: What? What do you want? Go away.
Entries.Tue2: What do you want from me? Money? I don't have any!
Entries.Tue4: Every time I try something new it goes horribly wrong. You learn to just stay in a shell.
Entries.Tue6: Life isn't so bad... at least I have pizza and spaghetti.$u
Entries.Wed: No, I don't have time to chat with you.
Entries.Wed8: Oscar let me stay here after they took my walls.#$e#It stinks here but at least I'm not living under the train tracks anymore.$s
Entries.Thu: What do you want? Leave me alone. I don't want to talk to you, capiche?
Entries.Thu4: You're really persistent. I get it, this clown is irresistible.
Entries.Thu6: I was born this way, can you believe it?
Entries.Thu8: You like talking to me? What the hell is wrong with you?.$h
Entries.Fri: Don't you have work to do?
Entries.Fri6: I'll definitely be going to the pizzaria tonight. What else is a clown gonna do?
Entries.Sat: Why are you bothering me? I want to be alone.
